tool_description: REALTIME! #1 Most Hated API by Bookmakers: Competitions, Matches & Odds for Pinnacle Sports. Available sports: Football (Soccer), Basketball, Ice Hockey, American Football, Tennis, Handball, Volleyball, Baseball, Cricket, Darts, Boxing, MMA, Rugby, Snooker, Table Tennis, Waterpolo, Futsal, Aussie Rules, Field Hockey, Floorball & Squash.
name: Pinnacle
title: Pinnacle

api_list.name: Match/Odds Details
api_list.description:
Retrieves the needed details for the Matches and Odds endpoints.
Use the matchupId of the Matches-endpoint as correct input.
Use the odd-ids and team names to connect the prices from the Odds-endpoint with the descriptions.

api_list.name: Odds (pre-game & live)
api_list.description:
Retrieves pre-game and live Odds for a given matchid in american odds format.
Use the matchupId from the Matches-endpoint and the odd-ids from the Details endpoint to connect Prices with Descriptions.

api_list.name: Competitions
api_list.description:
Retrieves all available competitions for a given sport id.
Use the id of the Sports-endpoint as input.

api_list.name: Sports
api_list.description: Retrieves all available sports for Pinnacle Sportsbook.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pinnacle10.p.rapidapi.com/pinnacle/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinnacle10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pinnacle10.p.rapidapi.com/pinnacle/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinnacle10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Matches
api_list.description:
Retrieves all available matches for a given league id.
Use the id of the Competitions-endpoint as correct input.

api_list.name: Matches (historical)
api_list.description:
Retrieves all historical Matches in our system. Take the endpoint "Competitions" as a reference for the input.
Use "matchid" for the endpoint "Odds (historical)".

api_list.name: Odds - (pre-game & live) - V1
api_list.description: Retrieves real-time Odds for the selected match filtered for Pinnacle Sports. Use the endpoint "Matches" first to get the correct input data for "matchid".

api_list.name: Matches - (may take time) - V1
api_list.description:
Retrieves all Matches in our system. As this endpoint is on demand, the first request of the day for the selected competition may take up to 30 seconds.
Use "matchid" for the endpoint "Odds".

required_parameters.name: match_urls
required_parameters.description: Links to each match by available bookmaker (true or false)

api_list.name: Competitions - V1
api_list.description:
Retrieves all competitions in our system for the selected sport.
Remember to use the received credentials of each competition for the endpoint "Matches".

api_list.name: Sports - V1
api_list.description: Retrieves all sports for Pinnacle Sportsbook
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pinnacle10.p.rapidapi.com/allsports_pinnacle"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinnacle10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Odds (historical)
api_list.description: Retrieves historical Odds for the selected match. Use the endpoint "Matches (historical)" first to get the correct input data for "matchid".

api_list.name: Python - Odds endpoint in Dataframe
